name: @vscode/dev-container-cli
description: Command Line Interface (CLI) for VS Code Dev Containers
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.test: env TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json npx mocha -r ts-node/register --exit test/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test-container-features: env TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json npx mocha -r ts-node/register --exit test/containerFeatures.*.test.ts
scripts.test-container-features-offline: env TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json npx mocha -r ts-node/register --exit test/containerFeatures.offline.test.ts
